text: 12.28: FG 13.1; Ro 12.6; Ef 2.20; 4.11-12Maaŋ muuŋgiap, Fhe Bakɨme wo siosan ŋaarir muun zav gumgi gu mbigir farasegi. Ana fharav, Zisas farasegi ŋaara gumgi ndi fegi. Ana mbera thɨgap, ana won kamthooŋ gumgi ndi fegi. Ana won kamthooŋ gumgi thɨgap, anan tɨvir harigi gumgi gu mbigi khɨvi gumgi ndi fegi. Ana vhɨra mirikori ga mbui gumgi ndi fegi. Ana vhɨra rɨɨi gumgi rɨmrɨɨ ga mbuim, mbe rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzgi gumgi ndi fegap, harigi gumgir kurkurigi gumgi ndi fegap, mbarkɨrga ŋaari ganɨnga gumgi ndi fegap, harigi ŋguir kaar vhov buni suanga gumgi ndi fegi.
